Header.title: We are
Header.paragraph: The only classes in Chiplun that your child will ever need!

About.paragraph: SM classes started in 2016 by Saquib and Muajja Dalvi with a vision to give quality education so that students can achieve their dreams.
About.paragraph2: Here we develop students learning and problem solving ability by teaching them from basic concepts so that they can score good not only in school exams but in various competitive/entrance exams also.
Why: We understand the students pain point
We work closely with the parents as well
We have been around for a long time now
We care for each and every student
Why2: We make learning fun and interesting
We follow path which works well for students
We are always open for constructive feedbacks

Services.name: Regular classes from standard 6th to 10th (State and CBSE board)
Diploma and Degree (Maths and Civil engineering subjects)

Features.title: Experienced Tutors
Features.text: We are a small yet strong team of experienced tutors.

Features.title: Clear Topic Explanations
Features.text: Explanation of all topics starting with basic concepts.

Features.title: Limited Students Batch
Features.text: To focus on the strength as well as weaknesses of each student we take limited students count per batch.
